Controls:

E - Pickup Objects

Gameloop

This section highlights the things you can do in the game. Currently these are written out as it's not always very obvious what the next step is (yet). 

After watching the introduction cutscene the player spawns in a dark environment. You can make your way through the entry gate and the lights will come on. 

Straight ahead there is a radio tower. At the bottom of this there is a console you have to fix to escape (beat the game).

On your left you can see a sign with "Murder Mansion" written on it. If you go there and approach the front door, you will enter the mansion.

In this mansion you have to solve several puzzles to collect a piece you need to repair the radio tower. 

Mansion Walkthrough:

  1. Solve the statue puzzle, this will open up a door.
  2. Step on the tile in the new room, this will give you access to almost all of the mansion.
  3. In the room on the left side of the entrance you will find a puzzle, a note on the table gives hints. You need to collect pieces throughout the mansion. 
  4. If you look left while entering the main hall you might be in for a surprise...
  5. Upon entering the main hall if you turn right there is a room on your right side. Here you find a room with a tile puzzle. (Tiles currently dont have any visual or audio feedback).
  6. On the left side of the main hall there is a maze. In this maze you have to step on 4 tiles to open a door. This door is located near the end of the maze.
  7. Once you have solved the initial chess puzzle a new door will be open. Here you can collect the piece you need to fix the radio.
  8. You can now exit the house from the way you entered.
  9. When back in the main area you can repair the radio.
